name: Travel back in time to 20th century Seoul!
description: Ikseondong is a small neighborhood full of Hanoks (traditional Korean houses) that are still being inhabited. It is as time has stood still in this little neighborhood. There are also several tea houses, a vintage shop, cafes, and a few restaurants in the area. If you're fed up with the usual touristic spots, Ikseondong is the perfect spot to explore.
